# Single table with multi column vindex
"select col1 from foo where (col2,col3) = (1,2)"
{
  "QueryType": "SELECT",
  "Original": "select kid from multicolvin where (column_b, column_c) in (1, 2)",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "Route",
    "Variant": "SelectEqualUnique",
    "Keyspace": {
      "Name": "user",
      "Sharded": true
    },
    "FieldQuery": "select kid from multicolvin where 1 != 1",
    "Query": "select kid from multicolvin where (column_b, column_c) in (1, 2)",
    "Table": "multicolvin",
    "Values": [
      1
    ],
    "Vindex": "colb_colc_map"
  }
}
